values: To shine is to make a bright light.
The candles are shining in the dark room.
vi. 发光；反射光；照耀表现突出，出众
vt. 照射〈美〉擦亮
n. 光亮；光泽磨，擦
时态:shone ，shined shining，shines

To shine is to give off or reflect bright light, or to excel or be outstanding in a particular way.
Shine refers to a bright, glowing appearance or luster, often associated with the reflection of light.
verb, noun
照耀
